rows.label: xs12030100_MSG0001
rows.name: That's the Lifehold Core?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12030100_MSG0002
rows.name: The coordinates place it off the west coast of Cauldros.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12030100_MSG0003
rows.name:
It’s no wonder we couldn’t find it—
it’s way out in the middle of the ocean.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12030100_MSG0004
rows.name: Did it sink underwater?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12030100_MSG0005
rows.name: We'll find out soon enough—let's suit up and get going.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12030100_MSG0005_02
rows.name: Secretary?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12030100_MSG0006
rows.name: Our survival as a species hinges on your efforts.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12030100_MSG0007
rows.name: Elma, we need your help. Please save us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12030100_MSG0008
rows.name: We're all in this together, Secretary.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12030100_MSG0009
rows.name:
My goal hasn't changed since I first set foot on
the White Whale. You of all people should know that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12030100_MSG0010
rows.name: I intend to see this through. That should go without saying.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12030100_MSG0011
rows.name: I know... It's just—we've put so much on your shoulders.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12030100_MSG0012
rows.name:
You can make it up to me with a nice,
long vacation once this is all over.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12030100_MSG0013
rows.name:
This planet fascinates me to no end.
I'd love to take some time to explore it with no agenda.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12030100_MSG0014
rows.name: Oh-ho! Can Tatsu be Elma's guide?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12030100_MSG0015
rows.name:
Of course, Tatsu do it free of charge.
It's all over the house.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12030100_MSG0016
rows.name: Let me guess: L taught you that one?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12030100_MSG0017
rows.name: We've sent the coordinates to every BLADE team we got.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12030100_MSG0018
rows.name:
Elma, I want you to act as commander
for everyone out there in the field.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12030100_MSG0019
rows.name: I'd be honored, Mr. Chief Engineer.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12030100_MSG0020
rows.name: Ha ha! I forgot how much I missed being called that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12030100_MSG0021
rows.name: "Commander" makes me feel like some useless old stuffed shirt.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12030100_MSG0022
rows.name: Yeah, and shirts aren't your style.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12030100_MSG0022_2
rows.name: All right team—let's go.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12030100_MSG0023
rows.name: Roger![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12030100_MSG0024
rows.name: Tatsu has lunches all packed![ST:wait ]
